column4: im using xchat 2.6.4. How do I ignore a person using this xchat version?
im using xchat 2.6.4. but in older versions I could right click on nicks and chose ignore! How do I ignore a person using this xchat version?

it doesnt work for me!  when I type /ignore mwe for example, it says:  Usage: IGNORE <mask> <types..> <options..> mask - host mask to ignore, eg: *!*@*.aol.com types - types of data to ignore, one or all of PRIV, CHAN, NOTI, CTCP, DCC, INVI, ALL
